title: Helldivers 2 Mod Manager Manifest
description: A manifest to describe your mod to the Helldivers 2 Mod Manager

Guid.description: A GUID. This is nothing visible but must be uniqe. The manager uses it to identify your mod.

Name.description: This is the display name of your mod.

Description.description: This is a short description of your mod.

IconPath.description: This is a short description of your mod.

Options.description: These are the variants of the mod. The listed names must be the exact same as the sub directories in your archive.
